name: Gemz Equalz Benz
description:
Important Notice:

Windows version is being released soon. 

Description:

Gemz Equalz Benz is a short game where Ralsei, Prince from the Dark, has his Mercedes Benz stolen by some hooligans. He needs to get it back. Filled with determination, Ralsei goes into the forest to seek another Mercedes Benz. 

This game was made for a game design class at school. 

Hardware Requirements: 

  1. Mouse
  2. Keyboard
  3. Headphones/speakers

Software Requirements:

  1. Mac OS
Game Introduction:
